data.name: Ahhnalog 112
data.detailed_description:
Gameplay
--------
This is a classic visual novel where you sit back & enjoy reading the story, making choices at key moments to navigate the branching narrative

Features
--------
- Fully animated 3D characters
- 3D environments
- 4 different girls you can interact with
- 11 different endings
- Adjustable text speed
- Text pacing simulates reading cadence

The protagonist
---------------
Takashi was always very clear about his great passion: spacecraft. Being a fighter pilot in the interspace navy had always been his dream.
But things didn't turn out exactly as he would have wished: he failed the entrance courses due to focusing all his attention on his other great passion: beautiful women.
He was expelled from the navy academy for his dismal results, leaving his pilot's license valid for commercial purposes only.
After years of working for exploiters who didn't even pay him the interplanetary minimum wage, he currently works as a freelance pilot while still dreaming of intergalactic battles.

The story
-----------
On one of his routine flights, Takashi receives a mysterious distress message over a disused radio channel.
Who, and why, is calling for help like this instead of using official channels?
Is it true?
Is it a trap?
The voice calling for help is female, so Takashi can't resist and answers the call like a gentleman.

Put yourself in Takashi's shoes and find out what's going on, help him decide at key moments and discover the 11 different endings of this science fiction story with some notes of erotic humor.


The girls
----------
- Nozomi: Always attentive and willing to please others, but doesn't take kindly to things not going her way.
- Emica: Brutally honest, straight to the point, no beating around the bush. If you don't like being dominated, don't go near her.
- Hinata: Shy and reserved, but eager to try new experiences.
- Etsuko: Friendly and approachable, she immediately gets along with anyone.

data.short_description: Put yourself in Takashi's shoes and find out what's going on, help him decide at key moments and discover the 11 different endings of this science fiction story with some notes of erotic humor.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains descriptions of sexual acts.
There is no full nudity, no genitals are shown.

All characters included in the game are over 18 years old.
